name: Mr. Smalls 10th Anniversary NEW YEARS EVE CELEBRATION
description:
Mr. Smalls 10th Anniversary New Years Eve celebration coming to ya live Dec 31st at 6pm to 2 am Jan 1st! Featuring DJs: Sunset Till Sunrise, Buku, Kevin James, Agent Smith, Kinetik, and Akuma! Special performances from Phat Man Dee, The Hoopla Girls dancing with hoops all night long...and can you say Burlesque girls, Bridge City Bombshells to be exact! tickets on sale tomorrow at mrsmalls.com. $8 advance & $10 at the door! 

We also have 30 VIP balcony tickets available for $100 which includes open bar, all you can eat buffet, party favors and a Mr. Smalls 10th Anniversary Commemorative Verdi champagne 8oz bottle! 

Come dance the year away with us! Let's bring in the next decade of live music in Pittsburgh together! Thank you for all your support over the last decade, we wouldn't be here with out you...our city ROCKS!

fields.name: owner
fields.description: The profile that created the event. generic `access_token`, `user_events` or `friends_events`. object containing `id` and `name` fields.

fields.name: description
fields.description: The long-form description of the event. generic `access_token`, `user_events` or `friends_events`.  `string`.

fields.name: start_time
fields.description: The start time of the event, as you want it to be displayed on facebook. generic `access_token`, `user_events` or `friends_events`. `string` containing an ISO-8601 formatted date/time or a UNIX timestamp; if it contains a time zone (not recommended), it will be converted to Pacific time before being stored and displayed.

fields.name: end_time
fields.description: The end time of the event, as you want it to be displayed on facebook. generic `access_token`, `user_events` or `friends_events`. `string` containing an ISO-8601 formatted date/time or a UNIX timestamp; if it contains a time zone (not recommended), it will be converted to Pacific time before being stored and displayed.

fields.name: location
fields.description: The location for this event.  generic `access_token`, `user_events` or `friends_events`. `string`.

fields.name: venue
fields.description: The location of this event.  generic `access_token`, `user_events` or `friends_events`.  object containing one or more of the following fields: `street`, `city`, `state`, `zip`, `country`, `latitude`, and `longitude` fields.

fields.name: privacy
fields.description: The visibility of this event.  generic `access_token`, `user_events` or `friends_events`.  `string` containing 'OPEN', 'CLOSED', or 'SECRET'

fields.name: updated_time
fields.description: The last time the event was updated. generic `access_token`, `user_events` or `friends_events`. `string` containing ISO-8601 date-time.
